summary:
Makes the coloured butterflies more interesting to look at. 

Increases texture size by 4X. 

Make sure your computer can handle bigger textures.
descriptionHtml:
I wanted to make the butterflies more interesting and exotic. Kind of hate monarchs because I see them ALL THE TIME where I live. 

Increases texture size by 4X. 

Make sure your computer can handle bigger textures. 

Anyway, hope you enjoy it. 

I also have a mod out for making Luna Moth\'s brighter which is lovely at night time :D

Install by placing texture folder in skyrims data folder, merge all files. 

Or use NMM preferably.

See here:

http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4019

My other mods:

Scary Spiders Hags and Other Beasts
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4050

HD Bunny Rabbits
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4033

Harley Quinn Jester Replacer
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3866

See the full list: [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/modules/members/index.php?id=697950] here[/url]
author: Chocolambot
